1543.quoteText: By contributing content to any ABC Online Service, you grant the ABC a royalty-free, non-exclusive licence to use Your Content in any way that we want, and in any media worldwide.
1543.title: This service employs a broad copyright license over user content including the right to distribute through any media

tosdr.case: The service can distribute your content through any media known now or in the future
tosdr.tldr: ABC Website Australia - Tos - Very broad right to use your material
